useCases.title: Temp Mail Use Cases
useCases.description: Temporary email services are suitable for various online scenarios. Here are some common use cases to help you protect your privacy while enjoying the convenience of the internet.

shopping.title: Online Shopping
shopping.description: Use temporary email when registering on e-commerce websites to avoid receiving constant promotional emails. Keep your primary mailbox clean, only receiving truly important information.

social.title: Social Media Registration
social.description: Protect your real identity while safely exploring various social platforms. Avoid personal data leaks and unnecessary social email notifications.

forum.title: Forum Participation
forum.description: Freely express your opinions on various online forums and communities without worrying about privacy leaks. Maintain anonymity while participating in meaningful discussions.

trial.title: Free Trial Services
trial.description: Register for trial versions of various online services without worrying about subscription reminders. When the trial period ends, you won't receive any promotional emails.

verification.title: One-time Verification
verification.description: Receive one-time verification codes or confirmation emails, such as public Wi-Fi login. Quickly and easily complete the authentication process without leaving any traces.

testing.title: Software Testing
testing.description: Developers can use temporary emails for multi-user testing without creating multiple real accounts. Simplify the testing process and improve development efficiency.

features.title: Why Choose Our Temporary Email Service?

instant.title: Instantly Available
instant.description: No registration or login required. Generate a temporary email address with one click and start using it immediately, saving your valuable time.

privacy.title: Privacy Protection
privacy.description: Protect your real email address from spam and avoid revealing your personal identity information.

simple.title: Simple to Use
simple.description: Clear and intuitive interface, easy to operate, suitable for users of all ages and technical levels.

secure.title: Safe and Reliable
secure.description: All email content is securely processed, with dangerous code removed to ensure your device's safety.

free.title: Completely Free
free.description: Our temporary email service is completely free for all users, with no hidden fees or intrusive advertisements.

auto.title: Automatic Checking
auto.description: Automatically polls for new emails, no need to manually refresh the page, receive important information instantly.

q1.question: Is temporary email secure?
q1.answer: Yes, our temporary email service is very secure. We do not store your personal information, and all email content is securely processed to remove potentially malicious code. However, please note that temporary email is not suitable for receiving sensitive or important information, as anyone who knows the email address can view the emails.

q2.question: How long are emails stored?
q2.answer: Emails in the temporary inbox are generally stored for 24 hours and are automatically deleted afterward. If you need to save important information, please copy or save the email content manually before it expires.

q3.question: Can I send emails?
q3.answer: Currently, our service only supports receiving emails and does not support sending emails. Temporary email is primarily used for receiving verification codes, registration confirmations, and other one-time emails.

q4.question: How long does it take to receive emails?
q4.answer: Most emails are received within a few seconds to a few minutes. If you are waiting for an important email, we recommend using the "Check New Emails" button or enabling the auto-check feature, which checks for new emails every 5 seconds.

q5.question: Why do some websites not accept temporary emails?
q5.answer: Some websites and services block temporary email domains to prevent spam registrations or abuse. This is a normal security measure, especially for important platforms like financial or social media sites. For these services, we recommend using your real email address for registration.

q6.question: Are there any limitations to using temporary email?
q6.answer: There are no limits on the number of times you can use our temporary email service; you can generate multiple email addresses. However, please use the service reasonably and avoid abusing it for sending spam or engaging in illegal activities. We reserve the right to restrict service for abusive behavior.

footer.description: Providing fast, secure temporary email services to protect your privacy and keep spam away.
footer.warning: This service is for lawful purposes only. Sending spam or illegal content is prohibited.
